description: Same as 「Duibiao jingpin」 (benchmarking competitors) or 「Biaogan guanli」 (benchmarking management). A management method of comparing and analyzing the quality of products or services with excellent examples from other companies to make improvements.

examples.chinese: 小米汽车应该在对标特斯拉
examples.translation: Xiaomi Auto should be benchmarking Tesla.

examples.chinese: 门店想要发展为什么一定要找对标
examples.translation: Why must a store look for a benchmark if it wants to develop?

examples.chinese: 国产手机对标苹果,越来越像iPhone
examples.translation: Domestic mobile phones are benchmarking Apple and becoming more and more like iPhones.
